The 1st EP from Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope is Now Available for Pre-Order Worldwide at Animate International   Apr 22nd 2022         Mori Calliope, a member of the English-speaking group "Hololive English" under the umbrella of Hololive Productions, makes her major label debut on Universal Music's Japanese music label, EMI Records.   Mori Calliope, whose YouTube channel just surpassed 2 million subscribers, made the announcement during a YouTube Live held in honor of her birthday.  The first EP "SHINIGAMI NOTE", to be released on July 20 (Wed), contains 6 new songs including "CapSule" by Mori Calliope x Suisei Hoshimachi.  The First Run Limited Edition contains a large LP size jacket and a Mori Calliope behind-the-scenes interview DVD. It also includes a Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge, and 5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  The participation of a group of brilliant writers and creators befitting a first major EP has already been confirmed, and will be announced at a later date.  ■Product Information Release Date: 07/20/2022 SHINIGAMI NOTE by Mori Calliope  → [First Run Limited Edition] [CD +DVD +GOODS] JAN：4988031512418 Price：\6000  【Tracklist】 6 new songs including “CapSule” by Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei ※CD content is the same for all formats  【DVD Contents】 ・Mori Calliope behind the scenes interview DVD (Scheduled to be 30 minutes)  【Manufacturer Bonus Content】 Postcard  ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※First Run Limited Editions only.  【Packaged Bonus Content】 ・Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge ・5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  →[Regular Edition] [1CD] 　 JAN：4988031512425 Price：\2500  【Animate Bonus】 Clear File (B5 Size) ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※Regular Editions only.  ■Order Page https://bit.ly/3EAkYP1  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About animate  animate is Japan's largest anime shop chain, with more than 120 stores in all 47 Japanese prefectures. We also deliver limited edition products and exclusive bonuses which are available only through our stores and online shop.   Through our exclusive products and services, we aim to become the go-to online shop for all your anime needs. The 1st EP from Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope is Now Available for Pre-Order Worldwide at Animate International   Apr 22nd 2022         Mori Calliope, a member of the English-speaking group "Hololive English" under the umbrella of Hololive Productions, makes her major label debut on Universal Music's Japanese music label, EMI Records.   Mori Calliope, whose YouTube channel just surpassed 2 million subscribers, made the announcement during a YouTube Live held in honor of her birthday.  The first EP "SHINIGAMI NOTE", to be released on July 20 (Wed), contains 6 new songs including "CapSule" by Mori Calliope x Suisei Hoshimachi.  The First Run Limited Edition contains a large LP size jacket and a Mori Calliope behind-the-scenes interview DVD. It also includes a Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge, and 5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  The participation of a group of brilliant writers and creators befitting a first major EP has already been confirmed, and will be announced at a later date.  ■Product Information Release Date: 07/20/2022 SHINIGAMI NOTE by Mori Calliope  → [First Run Limited Edition] [CD +DVD +GOODS] JAN：4988031512418 Price：\6000  【Tracklist】 6 new songs including “CapSule” by Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei ※CD content is the same for all formats  【DVD Contents】 ・Mori Calliope behind the scenes interview DVD (Scheduled to be 30 minutes)  【Manufacturer Bonus Content】 Postcard  ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※First Run Limited Editions only.  【Packaged Bonus Content】 ・Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge ・5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  →[Regular Edition] [1CD] 　 JAN：4988031512425 Price：\2500  【Animate Bonus】 Clear File (B5 Size) ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※Regular Editions only.  ■Order Page https://bit.ly/3EAkYP1  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About animate  animate is Japan's largest anime shop chain, with more than 120 stores in all 47 Japanese prefectures. We also deliver limited edition products and exclusive bonuses which are available only through our stores and online shop.   Through our exclusive products and services, we aim to become the go-to online shop for all your anime needs. The 1st EP from Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope is Now Available for Pre-Order Worldwide at Animate International   Apr 22nd 2022         Mori Calliope, a member of the English-speaking group "Hololive English" under the umbrella of Hololive Productions, makes her major label debut on Universal Music's Japanese music label, EMI Records.   Mori Calliope, whose YouTube channel just surpassed 2 million subscribers, made the announcement during a YouTube Live held in honor of her birthday.  The first EP "SHINIGAMI NOTE", to be released on July 20 (Wed), contains 6 new songs including "CapSule" by Mori Calliope x Suisei Hoshimachi.  The First Run Limited Edition contains a large LP size jacket and a Mori Calliope behind-the-scenes interview DVD. It also includes a Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge, and 5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  The participation of a group of brilliant writers and creators befitting a first major EP has already been confirmed, and will be announced at a later date.  ■Product Information Release Date: 07/20/2022 SHINIGAMI NOTE by Mori Calliope  → [First Run Limited Edition] [CD +DVD +GOODS] JAN：4988031512418 Price：\6000  【Tracklist】 6 new songs including “CapSule” by Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei ※CD content is the same for all formats  【DVD Contents】 ・Mori Calliope behind the scenes interview DVD (Scheduled to be 30 minutes)  【Manufacturer Bonus Content】 Postcard  ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※First Run Limited Editions only.  【Packaged Bonus Content】 ・Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge ・5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  →[Regular Edition] [1CD] 　 JAN：4988031512425 Price：\2500  【Animate Bonus】 Clear File (B5 Size) ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※Regular Editions only.  ■Order Page https://bit.ly/3EAkYP1  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About animate  animate is Japan's largest anime shop chain, with more than 120 stores in all 47 Japanese prefectures. The 1st EP from Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope is Now Available for Pre-Order Worldwide at Animate International   Apr 22nd 2022         Mori Calliope, a member of the English-speaking group "Hololive English" under the umbrella of Hololive Productions, makes her major label debut on Universal Music's Japanese music label, EMI Records.   Mori Calliope, whose YouTube channel just surpassed 2 million subscribers, made the announcement during a YouTube Live held in honor of her birthday.  The first EP "SHINIGAMI NOTE", to be released on July 20 (Wed), contains 6 new songs including "CapSule" by Mori Calliope x Suisei Hoshimachi.  The First Run Limited Edition contains a large LP size jacket and a Mori Calliope behind-the-scenes interview DVD. It also includes a Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge, and 5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  The participation of a group of brilliant writers and creators befitting a first major EP has already been confirmed, and will be announced at a later date.  ■Product Information Release Date: 07/20/2022 SHINIGAMI NOTE by Mori Calliope  → [First Run Limited Edition] [CD +DVD +GOODS] JAN：4988031512418 Price：\6000  【Tracklist】 6 new songs including “CapSule” by Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei ※CD content is the same for all formats  【DVD Contents】 ・Mori Calliope behind the scenes interview DVD (Scheduled to be 30 minutes)  【Manufacturer Bonus Content】 Postcard  ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※First Run Limited Editions only.  【Packaged Bonus Content】 ・Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge ・5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  →[Regular Edition] [1CD] 　 JAN：4988031512425 Price：\2500  【Animate Bonus】 Clear File (B5 Size) ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※Regular Editions only.  ■Order Page https://bit.ly/3EAkYP1  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About animate  animate is Japan's largest anime shop chain, with more than 120 stores in all 47 Japanese prefectures. It also includes a Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge, and 5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  The participation of a group of brilliant writers and creators befitting a first major EP has already been confirmed, and will be announced at a later date.  ■Product Information Release Date: 07/20/2022 SHINIGAMI NOTE by Mori Calliope  → [First Run Limited Edition] [CD +DVD +GOODS] JAN：4988031512418 Price：\6000  【Tracklist】 6 new songs including “CapSule” by Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei ※CD content is the same for all formats  【DVD Contents】 ・Mori Calliope behind the scenes interview DVD (Scheduled to be 30 minutes)  【Manufacturer Bonus Content】 Postcard  ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※First Run Limited Editions only.  【Packaged Bonus Content】 ・Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge ・5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  →[Regular Edition] [1CD] 　 JAN：4988031512425 Price：\2500  【Animate Bonus】 Clear File (B5 Size) ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※Regular Editions only.  ■Order Page https://bit.ly/3EAkYP1  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About animate  animate is Japan's largest anime shop chain, with more than 120 stores in all 47 Japanese prefectures. We also deliver limited edition products and exclusive bonuses which are available only through our stores and online shop. Title: The 1st EP from Hololive English VTuber Mori Calliope is Now Available for Pre-Order Worldwide at Animate International - Anime News Network:SEA
Data: Mori Calliope, a member of the English-speaking group "Hololive English" under the umbrella of Hololive Productions, makes her major label debut on Universal Music's Japanese music label, EMI Records.   Mori Calliope, whose YouTube channel just surpassed 2 million subscribers, made the announcement during a YouTube Live held in honor of her birthday.  The first EP "SHINIGAMI NOTE", to be released on July 20 (Wed), contains 6 new songs including "CapSule" by Mori Calliope x Suisei Hoshimachi.  The First Run Limited Edition contains a large LP size jacket and a Mori Calliope behind-the-scenes interview DVD. It also includes a Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge, and 5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  The participation of a group of brilliant writers and creators befitting a first major EP has already been confirmed, and will be announced at a later date.  ■Product Information Release Date: 07/20/2022 SHINIGAMI NOTE by Mori Calliope  → [First Run Limited Edition] [CD +DVD +GOODS] JAN：4988031512418 Price：\6000  【Tracklist】 6 new songs including “CapSule” by Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei ※CD content is the same for all formats  【DVD Contents】 ・Mori Calliope behind the scenes interview DVD (Scheduled to be 30 minutes)  【Manufacturer Bonus Content】 Postcard  ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※First Run Limited Editions only.  【Packaged Bonus Content】 ・Proof of Dead Beats: Crest Badge ・5 original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists  →[Regular Edition] [1CD] 　 JAN：4988031512425 Price：\2500  【Animate Bonus】 Clear File (B5 Size) ※Please note that offer ends as soon as bonus stock runs out. ※Regular Editions only.  ■Order Page https://bit.ly/3EAkYP1  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- About animate  animate is Japan's largest anime shop chain, with more than 120 stores in all 47 Japanese prefectures. Forum - View topicNEWS: Encouragement of Climb: Next Summit Anime Premieres in October With Half-Hour Episodes             Note: this is the discussion thread for this article     Anime News Network Forum Index -> Site-related -> Talkback    View previous topic :: View next topic     Author Message        RobbiRobb    Joined: 08 Oct 2021 		    Posts: 6       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 6:03 am            I'm really looking forward to this new season. With double the runtime we'll probably get the same amount of content as the second season again, if they decide to do more than one cour (which seems unlikely, but isn't completely out of the window), we might even get to see more. Gonna be interesting to see how they will adapt it, given that Koharu was actually introduced around the point where the content of season two ended and would have been around the cast for quite some time by now.      Back to top                  Moonsaber    Joined: 16 Jan 2007 		    Posts: 318 		    Location: USA 		        Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 9:13 am            Before there was Yuru Camp, there was Yama no Susume, and having both is GOOD.   Bummer that the first 4 episodes are retreads of old episodes, but maybe it is to set up the last 8 in style, we might be going after Fuji-san again?   Looking forward to this, one of my favorite short animes, glad to have it long.      Back to top                    Hoppy800    Joined: 09 Aug 2013 		    Posts: 2988       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 9:17 am            Seriously?   That's pretty good news.      Back to top                  Kalhiki    Joined: 30 Aug 2021 		    Posts: 20       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 11:22 am            This is my favorite anime. Happy to have a new season and at full length episodes.    The first four episodes being compilations is odd, but from my understanding the anime doesn't follow the manga 1:1. For instance Koharu, the new girl being introduced, apparently should have showed up much earlier (Season 2 I think). So if the "short stories" being added in is to accommodate missing chapters, I think it'll work.      Back to top                  Cardcaptor Takato    Joined: 27 Jan 2018 		    Posts: 3818       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 11:50 am            It would be nice if someone would rescue license season two since as far as I know it’s not streaming anywhere at the moment.      Back to top                  Sabruness    Joined: 23 Oct 2019 		    Posts: 78       Posted: Sat Apr 23, 2022 5:16 am            As someone who's always been curious about this series but not a fan of super short episodes, this announcement pleases me greatly. Especially with the first 4 eps being compilations of the previous seasons, it'll make things easier to watch it then. With double the runtime we'll probably get the same amount of content as the second season again, if they decide to do more than one cour (which seems unlikely, but isn't completely out of the window), we might even get to see more. Gonna be interesting to see how they will adapt it, given that Koharu was actually introduced around the point where the content of season two ended and would have been around the cast for quite some time by now.      Back to top                  Moonsaber    Joined: 16 Jan 2007 		    Posts: 318 		    Location: USA 		        Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 9:13 am            Before there was Yuru Camp, there was Yama no Susume, and having both is GOOD.   Bummer that the first 4 episodes are retreads of old episodes, but maybe it is to set up the last 8 in style, we might be going after Fuji-san again? Back to top                    Hoppy800    Joined: 09 Aug 2013 		    Posts: 2988       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 9:17 am            Seriously?   That's pretty good news.      Back to top                  Kalhiki    Joined: 30 Aug 2021 		    Posts: 20       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 11:22 am            This is my favorite anime. Happy to have a new season and at full length episodes.    The first four episodes being compilations is odd, but from my understanding the anime doesn't follow the manga 1:1. For instance Koharu, the new girl being introduced, apparently should have showed up much earlier (Season 2 I think). So if the "short stories" being added in is to accommodate missing chapters, I think it'll work.      Back to top                  Cardcaptor Takato    Joined: 27 Jan 2018 		    Posts: 3818       Posted: Fri Apr 22, 2022 11:50 am            It would be nice if someone would rescue license season two since as far as I know it’s not streaming anywhere at the moment.      Back to top                  Sabruness    Joined: 23 Oct 2019 		    Posts: 78       Posted: Sat Apr 23, 2022 5:16 am            As someone who's always been curious about this series but not a fan of super short episodes, this announcement pleases me greatly. Especially with the first 4 eps being compilations of the previous seasons, it'll make things easier to watch it then. Title: NEWS: Encouragement of Climb: Next Summit Anime Premieres in October With Half-Hour Episodes - Forum - Anime News Network:SEA
Data: This is my favorite anime. Happy to have a new season and at full length episodes.    The first four episodes being compilations is odd, but from my understanding the anime doesn't follow the manga 1:1. For instance Koharu, the new girl being introduced, apparently should have showed up much earlier (Season 2 I think). So if the "short stories" being added in is to accommodate missing chapters, I think it'll work.
